message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is a significant discount from my original offer and reflects our continued negotiations.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I can offer $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
